For the rest of the morning , [they]1083-they observed the unique behavior of the clouds on [the far side of [Hoolemere]23-hoolemere]1084-the far side of hoolemere . [The young owls of the weather chaw]1085-the young owls of the weather chaw were used to odd words such as baggywrinkles and scuppers and gutters . But now there were even stranger words as the rybs discussed “ pressure differential , ”[122-soren] “ thermal inversions , ”[122-soren] and “ convective columns . ”[122-soren]

By mid - afternoon , [they]1083-they were dismissed to take a short nap . [They]1083-they would be awakened at tween time , that time between the last drop of sun and the first shadows of twilight , and then take off across [Hoolemere]23-hoolemere .

“ Are [you]1963-you nervous , [Ruby]208-ruby ? ”[122-soren] [Soren]122-soren said as [they]1083-they made [their]1083-they way back from the top limbs for [their]1083-they naps .

“ [I]122-soren ’d be [a fool]1374-a fool not to be , ”[122-soren] replied the rusty - feathered owl .

“ But [you]1963-you fly so well . ”[122-soren]

“ Not to mention , ”[209-martin] [Martin]209-martin added , “ that both of [you]1963-you are about twice as big as [me]209-martin . ”[209-martin]

“ What are [you]1963-you most scared of ? ”[122-soren] [Soren]122-soren asked .

“ That thing [they]1083-they call crowning , ”[208-ruby] [Ruby]208-ruby said quickly . “ When the fire leaps from treetop to treetop . [I]208-ruby ca n’t imagine what it does to the air . [I]208-ruby mean , flying through it must be almost impossible . [You]1963-you could never even half guess where the dead falls might be . ”[208-ruby]

“ Technically , the fire does [that”—Otulissa]225-that”—otulissa[209-martin] had caught up with them—“because the fire climbs what is called , according to the literature , a fuel ladder . ”[208-ruby]

“ Yes , and think of [me]209-martin , ”[209-martin] [Martin]209-martin now spoke . “ [I]209-martin am on the ground , supposedly looking for the smallest embers . One of these crowning things happens , and at [my]209-martin weight [I]209-martin get sucked straight up the fuel ladder . ”[209-martin]

“ [We]1086-they all have to spend time on [the ground]1965-the ground , not just [you]1963-you , ”[122-soren] [Soren]122-soren said . “ It could happen to any of [us]1086-they . [You]1963-you do n’t have to be little . ”[122-soren] [Martin]209-martin cocked [his]209-martin head and blinked . [He]209-martin did not look convinced .

Although [they]1086-they had yet to be in an actual forest fire , [each member of the chaw]1087-each member of the chaw had a type of coal or ember [they]1086-they were in charge of gathering . [Ruby]208-ruby , being [the best flier]1088-the best flier , would seek airborne embers that were dispersed to the highest parts of the thermal draft columns . [Soren]122-soren and [Otulissa]176-otulissa were assigned a midpoint position on various sides of the convection column and [little Martin]209-martin was on the ground . But , indeed , [they]1086-they would all have to do a certain amount of groundwork .

[Soren]122-soren could not help but think about how different this flight across [Hoolemere]23-hoolemere was from the time [he]122-soren had crossed [the sea]284-the sea to [the Great Ga’Hoole Tree]259-the great ga’hoole tree nearly six months before . [He]122-soren remembered how the blizzard had raged , how [the entire world]615-the entire world had turned a swirling white , and the sky and water had melted into one indistinguishable mass . Today , the air was clear , [the sea]284-the sea below calm with barely a white cap to ruffle the blueness . Seagulls dipped in the last rays of the setting sun . The silvery glint of a fish leaping to escape a larger fish sometimes flashed above [the water]622-the water ’s surface . Yet as [they]1086-they drew closer to [the opposite shore]1094-the opposite shore , the air did seem different . And although [Soren]122-soren , like other owls , did not have the keenest sense of smell , the air seemed tinged with an acrid odor .

[They]1086-they landed on [the ridge of [some high cliffs]1096-some high cliffs]1095-the ridge of some high cliffs . [Ezylryb]191-ezylryb was already pointing with [his]191-ezylryb three - taloned foot to [some clouds just beyond [the ridge]1098-the ridge]1097-some clouds just beyond the ridge . “ [We]1086-they call them Ga’Hoole clouds . [You]122-soren know why ? ”[191-ezylryb]

[Otulissa]176-otulissa ’s talon shot up . “ Because they are the shape of the seeds found in the Ga’Hoole fruits . ”[176-otulissa]

“ Right - o , [missy]1966-missy , ”[191-ezylryb] [Ezylryb]191-ezylryb said .

[Martin]209-martin gave a little sigh . “ [She]1967-she never stops , does [she]1967-she ? ”[209-martin]

It was clear that [Martin]209-martin was very nervous . More nervous than the others . [Soren]122-soren felt bad for [him]209-martin . [He]209-martin was the smallest owl in [the chaw]1099-the chaw . It had to be scary . “ Do n’t worry , [Martin]209-martin . [You]209-martin ’re going to be all right . ”[209-martin]

“ [Soren]122-soren , that ’s kind of [you]122-soren , but do [you]122-soren realize that [I]191-ezylryb am the first Saw - whet to ever be in [the colliering chaw]1968-the colliering chaw ? ”[191-ezylryb]

“ [They]1969-they must think [you]209-martin ’re special , [Martin]209-martin , ”[122-soren] [Soren]122-soren said .

“ But what if [I]209-martin ’m not ? ”[209-martin] [Martin]209-martin said , a squeak of desperation creeping into [his]209-martin voice .

[Ezylryb]191-ezylryb continued speaking about the Ga’Hoole clouds . “ The reason their tops are curved like that is because — well , [you]122-soren tell [me]191-ezylryb . ”[191-ezylryb]

Once again , [Otulissa]176-otulissa ’s talon shot up . “ It ’s simple weather physics . [I]176-otulissa was reading about it in [Emerilla]222-strix emerilla ’s , [the renowned weathertrix]1970-the renowned weathertrix ’s book — [she]176-otulissa ’s [a Spotted Owl]775-a spotted owl , [I]176-otulissa might add . ”[176-otulissa] [Otulissa]176-otulissa cast [her]176-otulissa eyes downward in what [Soren]122-soren thought was an outrageously phony show of modesty .

“ Just get to the point , [darlin ’]1912-darlin ’ , ”[191-ezylryb] [Ezylryb]191-ezylryb barked .

“ Oh , yes , of course . It is because the winds atop the cloud are blowing much faster than the winds below . ”[191-ezylryb]

[Soren]122-soren felt [Martin]209-martin begin to tremble . “ [I]122-soren might become one of those burning airborne embers that [Ruby]208-ruby grabs on the fly , ”[122-soren] [he]122-soren said in a voice drenched with fear .

“ All right now , [we]1973-we camp here and [we]1973-we wait . [We]1973-we wait until the fire is safe for penetration and retrieval . [Elvan]205-elvan and [Bubo]197-bubo shall take over the mission at that point , directing [you]209-martin to the richest coal and [ember beds]1974-ember beds . [I]122-soren shall remain [here]1419-here and watch the weather and fly in for periodic reports . [You]209-martin do as [you]209-martin ’re told and [no one]880-no one will get hurt . [Ruby]208-ruby and [Poot]219-poot fly top layer . [[Elvan]205-elvan with [Otulissa]176-otulissa]1977-elvan with otulissa will be mid - layer . Below [them]1977-elvan with otulissa is [Soren]122-soren , who covers [Martin]209-martin on the ground . [Bubo]197-bubo and [I]122-soren will be ready if [anyone]394-anyone needs help . [You]209-martin are to keep [your]209-martin eye out for [[your]209-martin mate]1495-your mate . ”[122-soren]

It was close to midnight when [Ezylryb]191-ezylryb announced that [they]1100-they would be taking off for [the next ridge]1101-the next ridge . [He]191-ezylryb had already flown several reconnaissance flights with [Poot]219-poot . [He]191-ezylryb now arrived back on [the ridge]1098-the ridge .

“ There ’s a possible temperature inversion at [the east end of [the valley]385-the valley]1980-the east end of the valley . [We]1100-they ’re not sending any owl down there . Temperature inversions trap smoke , and then do [you]122-soren know what can happen when the smoke starts to rise ? ”[122-soren] [Soren]122-soren thought that it must mean that the temperature might change , but again , and most annoyingly , [Otulissa]176-otulissa ’s talon shot up . “ Shut [your]122-soren beak , [Otulissa]176-otulissa , ”[191-ezylryb] [Ezylryb]191-ezylryb snapped . “ [I]191-ezylryb feel that [Soren]122-soren might have the answer despite not being as deeply familiar as [you]122-soren are with [Strix Emerilla]222-strix emerilla . ”[191-ezylryb]

How does [he]191-ezylryb feel that [I]0-i have the answer ? Is this like being marked — [Ezylryb]191-ezylryb seeing things in [me]0-i that others ca n’t ? But [Soren]122-soren did feel that [he]122-soren knew the answer . So [he]122-soren proceeded tentatively . “ [I]122-soren think that it means that when the smoke rises there could be a change in the air . ”[122-soren] [Ezylryb]191-ezylryb looked straight at [him]122-soren . The light from [his]191-ezylryb yellow eyes did not burn now but seemed to illuminate [Soren]122-soren ’s entire brain . [Soren]122-soren felt surer , more confident , but mostlyhe could easily envision the invisible air . “ The air would rise and turn and circulate upward and when this happens , [I]122-soren think the fire will burn harder , more fiercely . ”[122-soren]

“ Exactly ! ”[191-ezylryb] boomed [Ezylryb]191-ezylryb . “ And how do [you]122-soren know this , [lad]1781-lad ? ”[191-ezylryb]

“ [I]122-soren see it in [my]122-soren mind . [I]122-soren can imagine it . [I]122-soren feel something , [I]122-soren think in [my]122-soren gizzard , about the movement of air and heat and … ”[122-soren]

“ Yes , thank [you]122-soren , [lad]1781-lad . ”[191-ezylryb] [Ezylryb]191-ezylryb turned to the other owls of the chaw . “ There are many ways to learn — through books , through practice , and through gizzuition . They are all good ways , but few of [us]1984-us have gizzuition . ”[191-ezylryb]

“ But what is gizzuition ? ”[176-otulissa] [Otulissa]176-otulissa asked warily .

[Ezylryb]191-ezylryb began to speak but kept [his]191-ezylryb gaze on [Soren]122-soren . “ It is a kind of thinking beyond the normal reasoning processes by which one immediately apprehends the truth , perceives and understands reality . It can not really be taught , but it can be developed by being extremely attentive and sensitive to the natural world . ”[191-ezylryb]

[Soren]122-soren blinked . [I]0-i AM something in [this old owl]1103-this old owl ’s eyes . [I]0-i am almost as smart as [Otulissa]176-otulissa , and [Ezylryb]191-ezylryb believes in [me]0-i !

It was now time to move to [a ridge closer to the fire]1104-a ridge closer to the fire . The chaw lifted into the air , each owl flying close to its buddy . [They]1105-they were not halfway to [the next ridge]1101-the next ridge when [they]1105-they saw the thick smoke , almost white in the night , rolling up , and then the tongues of flame dancing against the night . [Ezylryb]191-ezylryb began a steeply banking turn . [The others]344-the others followed . [Bubo]197-bubo and [Poot]219-poot arrived shortly with fresh voles and mice in [their]1108-their talons , some still squirming .

“ Eat light , eat all the hair ! ”[191-ezylryb] [Ezylryb]191-ezylryb barked .

“ [I]209-martin wonder why [he]197-bubo always calls it hair ? ”[209-martin] [Martin]209-martin said quietly .

“ [They]1985-they say [he]197-bubo comes from a distant place called [the land of the Great [North Waters]81-north waters]1986-the land of the great north waters and [they]1985-they have odd ways of speaking , ”[208-ruby] [Ruby]208-ruby said .

“ But hair ? What ’s hair ? ”[209-martin] [Martin]209-martin persisted .

“ Well , there ’s fur and there ’s feathers — [I]208-ruby think it ’s something in between , ”[208-ruby] [Ruby]208-ruby said . “ Do [you]209-martin want [me]208-ruby to ask [Otulissa]176-otulissa ? ”[208-ruby]

“ No ! ”[122-soren] [Soren]122-soren and [Martin]209-martin both groaned .

Less than an hour had passed when [Bubo]197-bubo flew down from [his]197-bubo higher perch . “ Prepare to fly . ”[197-bubo]

[The owls]455-the owls stood on [the thin granite lip of [the ridge]1098-the ridge]1110-the thin granite lip of the ridge , [their]455-the owls talons hooked over the edge . [They]455-the owls spread [their]455-the owls wings , and [Bubo]197-bubo gave the command . “ FIRE ! ”[197-bubo] [They]455-the owls lifted off — first [Bubo]197-bubo and [Elvan]205-elvan , then [Ruby]208-ruby and [Poot]219-poot , next [Otulissa]176-otulissa , [Soren]122-soren , and [Martin]209-martin , and last , as [a rear guard]1112-a rear guard , Ezyl - ryb .

[They]455-the owls had not flown very far before [they]455-the owls felt the heat on [their]455-the owls faces . [They]455-the owls had anticipated the heat but not the noise . A monster roar raged in [their]455-the owls ears . [Soren]122-soren had never heard anything like it . [Bubo]197-bubo and [Elvan]205-elvan had prepared [them]455-the owls for everything but this noise . [They]455-the owls knew about the heat . [They]455-the owls knew about the violent updrafts , the so - called cool spots , and [the dead falls]1113-the dead falls . [They]455-the owls even knew about the most dreaded trick fire could pull — fire blinking . This happened when the fire , raging with all its deadly beauty , actually transfixed an owl so that it could not fly . [It]1114-it went yeep and , with its wings locking , the owl lost its instincts to fly and suddenly plummeted to the ground . Or if the owl was already on the ground and the fire began to spread rapidly toward it , the owl simply could not lift off , for its wings hung still and motionless like dead things by its side . But [no one]880-no one had told [him]122-soren about the noise .

“ [You]122-soren ’ll get used to it . ”[205-elvan] [Elvan]205-elvan had flown up just over [Soren]122-soren and [Martin]209-martin . “ It ’s always a shock at first . There is no way to describe it . ”[122-soren] [He]122-soren had to shout over the roar of the fire . Below , a sheet of flame lay flat against [a hillside]1116-a hillside . The thermal drafts came up like slabs of rock . [Martin]209-martin and [Soren]122-soren were sucked up at least twenty feet but as [they]455-the owls passed [the hill]1117-the hill [they]455-the owls felt a terrific coolness and [they]455-the owls dropped another thirty feet . [Soren]122-soren realized that it was only cool compared to the heat [they]455-the owls had just flown through . [Bubo]197-bubo now circled back . [He]197-bubo had been flying far out in front . “ Good ember beds ahead . Perfect for all of [you]455-the owls . ”[197-bubo]

So this was it , [Soren]122-soren thought . This was when [they]455-the owls became [true colliers]1118-true colliers . Just then , like a shooting star , something red whizzed by .

“ Beautiful catch , [Ruby]208-ruby , ”[219-poot] shouted [Poot]219-poot .

“ What [a natural that Short - eared Owl]1987-a natural that short - eared owl is ! ”[205-elvan] [Elvan]205-elvan gasped in amazement .

[Ruby]208-ruby began to wing off toward [the coal buckets that [Bubo]197-bubo had set up on [the ridge]1098-the ridge]1119-the coal buckets that bubo had set up on the ridge . The small buckets made in [[his]197-bubo forge]1863-his forge , with bits of kindling in the bottom already lit , would keep the coals hot .

“ All right , [Martin]209-martin going in ! ”[205-elvan] [Elvan]205-elvan called out the command . [The little owl]685-the little owl began a tight spiraling plunge to earth . “ Cover [him]209-martin , [Soren]122-soren . ”[685-the little owl]

[Soren]122-soren would fly cover until [Martin]209-martin returned with a beakful of cinders . [Elvan]205-elvan actually carried the very small cinder pot in [his]197-bubo talons . [Martin]209-martin was supposed to not only collect cinders but report back on the larger coals that [Soren]122-soren and [Otulissa]176-otulissa were to retrieve .

[Soren]122-soren hovered above with a careful eye on [the little owl]685-the little owl . [He]122-soren was getting used to the noise . Indeed , not only was [he]122-soren getting used to it but within the thunderous roar [he]122-soren could seek out smaller sounds , like the sound of [Martin]209-martin ’s beating heart , which grew more rapid as [he]209-martin plunged . As [Martin]209-martin ’s heartbeat quickened , [Soren]122-soren hoped with all [his]122-soren heart , gizzard , and soul that [the little Saw - whet Owl]1124-the little saw - whet owl would be all right . [He]122-soren could see now that [Martin]209-martin was on the ground .

“ Play [your]685-the little owl position , [Otulissa]176-otulissa , ”[205-elvan] [Elvan]205-elvan rasped . [Ruby]208-ruby had just caught another sparking coal .

“ But [all the good ones]1988-all the good ones go up there . [We]1125-we never get a chance . ”[205-elvan]

“ Shut [your]685-the little owl beak . [You]685-the little owl want to be sent back to [the ridge]1098-the ridge ? [You]685-the little owl ’ll have [your]685-the little owl chance . ”[1125-we]

But [Soren]122-soren was not paying any attention to [them]1125-we . [He]122-soren must keep [his]122-soren focus on [Martin]209-martin , who was now just a little smudge on the ground . A cloud of smoke temporarily obscured [him]209-martin and [Soren]122-soren flew lower .

There [he]209-martin was ! There [he]209-martin was ! Good heavens , [he]209-martin was coming up fast !

“ [He]209-martin ’s coming in loaded ! ”[197-bubo] [Bubo]197-bubo slid in next to [Elvan]205-elvan .

And then [he]197-bubo was there . Cinders poured from [his]197-bubo small beak . [His]197-bubo face was sooty and smudged but [his]197-bubo eyes danced with a light as bright as the fire . “ [I]197-bubo did it ! [I]197-bubo did it ! ”[197-bubo]

“ [You]205-elvan certainly did , [young’un]160-young’un . ”[197-bubo] [Bubo]197-bubo flew up and tousled [Martin]209-martin ’s head feathers with [his]197-bubo talon .

“ [I]209-martin ca n’t wait to go back , ”[209-martin] [Martin]209-martin shouted .

“ Hold on there , ”[205-elvan] [Elvan]205-elvan said . “ First , [your]205-elvan report . ”[205-elvan]

“ Embers about the size of pellets uphill from where [I]197-bubo landed . ”[197-bubo]

“ Excellent , ”[205-elvan] [Elvan]205-elvan said . [Elvan]205-elvan then flew off to confer with [Bubo]197-bubo and [Ezylryb]191-ezylryb .

“ [Soren]122-soren , there is nothing like it . [I]197-bubo ca n’t tell [you]122-soren . As soon as [I]197-bubo got [there]1515-there [I]197-bubo just was n’t frightened at all . And [I]197-bubo ca n’t describe what it ’s like to grab the cinders in [your]122-soren beak . It ’s … ”[197-bubo]

“ Intoxicating , ”[176-otulissa] [Otulissa]176-otulissa broke in . “ Yes , [I]176-otulissa read about it . [You]122-soren must be careful , though . [Strix Emerilla]222-strix emerilla wrote that [some colliers]1991-some colliers get so drunk on the cinders that [they]1991-some colliers do not heed weather warnings . ”[176-otulissa]

“ Well , it ’s very strange the feeling [you]122-soren get when [you]122-soren grab them and then fly with [them]1991-some colliers . It ’s something , ”[1126-he] [he]1126-he paused . “ Something very powerful . ”[1126-he]

“ Now ’s the time , [Soren]122-soren . [You]122-soren ’re going in ! ”[205-elvan] [Elvan]205-elvan ordered .

“ What about [me]176-otulissa ? ”[176-otulissa] [Otulissa]176-otulissa wailed .

“ Shut [your]122-soren beak , [your]122-soren turn will come , ”[197-bubo] [Bubo]197-bubo yelled .

[Soren]122-soren pitched into a spiraling downward twist . [He]122-soren felt [himself]122-soren buffeted by a sudden fierce updraft , but [he]122-soren had gathered enough speed to bore through it . Then [he]122-soren was on the ground . It was a strange landscape . Charred skeletons of trees clawed the night , and then scattered about were the coals like hot glowing rocks . [They]1127-they were told to work quickly but at the same time not to rush . A steady pace is the best pace , [Bubo]197-bubo had told [them]1127-they . How had [Martin]209-martin , so little , done it and found cinders perfectly sized for [his]209-martin beak ? Great Glaux , how embarrassing it would be , [Soren]122-soren thought , if [he]122-soren could not find embers , if [he]122-soren came back empty - beaked . [Bubo]197-bubo and [Elvan]205-elvan had tried to emphasize that [no one]880-no one should be embarrassed . Oftentimes in the beginning [a young collier]1129-a young collier did not find a suitable coal . There was no shame in returning empty - beaked . But [Soren]122-soren knew there was .

Suddenly , [Soren]122-soren heard a terrible cracking sound . The flames turned a stand of trees just in front of [him]122-soren into one immense torch . [He]122-soren looked up and saw the crowns of other trees igniting . Crown fire ! [Ruby]208-ruby ’s worse fear . But [Ruby]208-ruby had been worried about the air above and now here [he]122-soren was below . [He]122-soren began to feel a mighty pull on [him]122-soren . Was [he]122-soren going to be sucked up ? The last thing [Soren]122-soren remembered thinking about clearly was [himself]122-soren turning into a feathery ball of embers . A thought raced through [his]122-soren head : With [my]0-i luck , [I]0-i ’ll be caught by [Otulissa]176-otulissa . What will it matter ? [I]0-i ’ll be dead .

CHAPTER TWENTY - ONE

“ A Coal in [My]0-i Beak ! ”[0-i]

[I]0-i have a coal in [my]0-i beak ! [I]0-i have a coal in [my]0-i beak ! The words kept running through [Soren]122-soren ’s head . [He]122-soren was flying in ascending circles , effortlessly . [He]122-soren was not singed . [He]122-soren was not burning , and there was this wonderful glowing thing in [his]122-soren beak that , indeed , seemed to flood [his]122-soren entire being with an extraordinary feeling . It was as if every single one of [his]122-soren hollow bones , every feather shaft brimmed with this feeling of transcendent power . Joy filled [him]122-soren , a joy such as [he]122-soren had never felt since perhaps the first time [he]122-soren had ever flown . But how [he]122-soren got this coal was still a mystery to [him]122-soren . [He]122-soren flew back to the ridge where the buckets were . [Martin]209-martin was beside [him]122-soren .

“ [You]122-soren were spectacular , [Soren]122-soren . [I]209-martin was so nervous when [I]209-martin saw that crown fire break and then when [we]1130-we saw [you]122-soren getting sucked up , [I]209-martin nearly went yeep . ”[209-martin]

“ But what happened ? ”[122-soren] [Soren]122-soren asked . [They]1130-we were to stay on [the ridge]1098-the ridge until [the rest of the chaw]1132-the rest of the chaw returned .

“ [You]122-soren mean to tell [me]209-martin [you]122-soren do n’t know ? ”[209-martin]

“ Not exactly . ”[209-martin]

“ [You]122-soren did a reverse loop to escape the pull and as [you]122-soren were coming out of it this coal flew by . [Bubo]197-bubo said [he]197-bubo never saw a coal of that size go up so high , but [you]122-soren caught it ! Caught it on the loop , [Soren]122-soren . [I]209-martin mean it was better flying than anything [Ruby]208-ruby has ever done . It was absolutely spectacular . ”[209-martin]

“ Great Glaux , [I]122-soren wish [I]122-soren ’d seen it , ”[122-soren] [Soren]122-soren said .

[Martin]209-martin hooted loudly . “ [You]122-soren did it , [Soren]122-soren ! [You]122-soren did it ! ”[209-martin]

[Otulissa]176-otulissa flew in next with [Ruby]208-ruby and [Poot]219-poot . [She]176-otulissa had a full beak and dumped the coals into the bucket . “ [I]176-otulissa got one ! [I]176-otulissa got one ! ”[176-otulissa] And then [she]176-otulissa stopped and looked up , genuinely modest now . “ But , [Soren]122-soren , it is nothing compared to what [you]122-soren did . ”[176-otulissa]

“ Well , thank [you]122-soren , [Otulissa]176-otulissa … er … uh … That is very kind of [you]122-soren . ”[176-otulissa]

[Otulissa]176-otulissa bobbed [her]176-otulissa head and actually said nothing for once . [Martin]209-martin blinked at [Soren]122-soren as if to say , “ [I]209-martin wonder how long that will last ? ”[209-martin]

[Soren]122-soren looked about for [Ezylryb]191-ezylryb . [He]122-soren wondered if [Ezyl - ryb]202-ezyl - ryb had seen [him]122-soren . Just then , [the Whiskered Screech]188-the whiskered screech alighted with a bucket . [He]188-the whiskered screech barely looked at [Soren]122-soren but busied [himself]188-the whiskered screech shifting some of the coals into the new bucket .

Oh , no , [Soren]122-soren thought . Will [I]0-i ever understand this owl ?

[Ezylryb]191-ezylryb was making [his]191-ezylryb way down the line of buckets now . As [he]191-ezylryb came next to the bucket where [Soren]122-soren had dropped [his]122-soren coal , [he]122-soren turned to look at [him]191-ezylryb . The coal [he]191-ezylryb held in [his]191-ezylryb beak cast an eerie glow on [his]191-ezylryb whiskered face . [His]191-ezylryb amber eyes appeared red . “ [I]191-ezylryb hear [you]219-poot did a fair night ’s work , ”[191-ezylryb] [he]191-ezylryb mumbled through the coal . Then added , “ Magnificent , perhaps . ”[191-ezylryb] [He]191-ezylryb dropped the coal in the bucket and flew off to confer with [Poot]219-poot .

[They]1133-them began [their]1133-them homeward journey with just an hour to spare before First Light . “ Do n’t worry about crows and mobbing , ”[205-elvan] [Elvan]205-elvan said . “ [They]1133-them never come near when [we]1133-them ’re carrying live coals . ”[205-elvan]

It was a beautiful time to fly . The air grew fresher and a light wind now ruffled the water into lacy crests . Even now , with the coals and cinders tame in the buckets , [their]1133-them power seemed to touch [them]1133-them . Fire , of course , was perhaps the most important element that made the Great Ga’Hoole Tree different from [any other kingdom of owls]1134-any other kingdom of owls . It made [them]1133-them more than [a community]1135-a community or [a gathering of owls]1136-a gathering of owls . It made [them]1133-them [a fellowship]1137-a fellowship . And if [they]1133-them were to rise each night into the blackness and perform noble deeds , it was perhaps the fire that helped [them]1133-them do this : fire punched up to fierce heats with [Bubo]197-bubo ’s bellows for forging metals into battle claws ; fire tamed into candle flames for reading and learning . And here [these young owls of the chaw]1138-these young owls of the chaw , just barely finished with being owlets [themselves]1138-these young owls of the chaw , were flying back across [the Sea of Hoolemere]33-the sea of hoolemere with this precious element . No wonder [they]1138-these young owls of the chaw felt powerful . And now , as the sun rose bloodred in the east , [Bubo]197-bubo ’s deep rumble began to ring out across [the water]622-the water . It was the song of [the colliers]1140-the colliers .

Give [me]0-i a hot coal glowing bright red ,

Give [me]0-i an ember sizzling with heat ,

These are the jewels made for [my]0-i beak .

[We]1141-we fly between flames and never get singed

[We]1141-we plunge through the smoke and never cringe .

The secrets of fire , its strange winds , its rages ,

[We]1141-we know it all as it rampages

Through forests , through [canyons]1142-canyons ,

Up hillsides and down .

[We]1141-we ’ll track [it]1143-it .

We’l l find it .

Take coals by the pound .

[We]1141-we ’ll yarp in the heart of the hottest flame

Then bring back its coals and make them tame .

For [we]1141-we are [the colliers]1140-the colliers brave beyond all

[We]1141-we are [the owls of [the colliering chaw]1968-the colliering chaw]1145-the owls of the colliering chaw !

[They]1138-these young owls of the chaw arrived shortly after daybreak at [the Great Ga’Hoole Tree]259-the great ga’hoole tree , [their]1138-these young owls of the chaw faces smudged , [their]1138-these young owls of the chaw beaks sooty black . But [they]1138-these young owls of the chaw were welcomed as [heroes]1148-heroes . The coals were delivered to [[Bubo]197-bubo ’s forge]962-bubo ’s forge and then there was a great banquet .

“ Where ’s [Twilight]123-twilight ? ”[122-soren] [Soren]122-soren said as [he]122-soren sat down with [Gylfie]125-gylfie at [Mrs. Plithiver]120-mrs. plithiver ’s table . “ And [Primrose]181-primrose ? ”[122-soren] [Soren]122-soren wanted to tell [Twilight]123-twilight about the forest fire . Few things impressed [Twilight]123-twilight but this might .

“ [They]1992-they ’re both out on a mission and so is [Digger]126-digger . [They]1992-they needed the tracking and search - and - rescue chaws . Something big ’s going on , ”[125-gylfie] [Gylfie]125-gylfie said .

“ What ? ”[125-gylfie]

“ [I]122-soren ’m not sure exactly . [Boron]171-boron is being very quiet about it . But suddenly a lot of owlets need rescuing fast . ”[122-soren] Just then , [he]122-soren saw [Ezylryb]191-ezylryb huddled with [Boron]171-boron and [Strix Struma]187-strix struma in a corner of [the dining hollow]810-the dining hollow . [They]1151-they looked terribly serious , and [he]122-soren saw [Ezylryb]191-ezylryb nodding quickly every now and then . [Poot]219-poot started to approach the three owls , and [he]122-soren was immediately shooed away .

Because [Ezylryb]191-ezylryb had not taken up [his]191-ezylryb usual position with [Elvan]205-elvan at [the head of [Octavia]218-octavia]1152-the head of octavia , the weather and colliering table was empty . [Martin]209-martin and [Ruby]208-ruby had joined [Soren]122-soren and [Gylfie]125-gylfie at [Mrs. P.]128-mrs. p. ’s , along with [Otulissa]176-otulissa . “ Thank goodness [we]1153-we can now have [our]1153-we vole roasted , ”[176-otulissa] [Otulissa]176-otulissa said . “ It seems like forever since [we]1153-we ’ve had anything cooked . ”[176-otulissa]

“ [I]128-mrs. p. would have thought [you]128-mrs. p. would have had [your]128-mrs. p. fill of things roasting after flying into that fire , ”[128-mrs. p.] [Mrs. P.]128-mrs. p. said , and [they]1153-we all laughed . “ Now [I]128-mrs. p. do have a little announcement to make . ”[128-mrs. p.] [The old nest - maid snake]1154-the old nest - maid snake spoke softly .

“ What is it , [Mrs. P.]128-mrs. p. ? ”[122-soren] [Soren]122-soren asked .

“ Well , [I]122-soren have been asked to join the Harp Guild . ”[122-soren]

“ Oh , [Mrs. P.]128-mrs. p. ! ”[1153-we] [they]1153-we all cried .

Perhaps [Soren]122-soren ’s visit to [Madame Plonk]183-madame plonk had counted for something . [He]122-soren had dared not even hope ever since [he]122-soren had visited [[her]183-madame plonk extraordinary apartments]1155-her extraordinary apartments that day . [Soren]122-soren could n’t have been happier . Everything , [he]122-soren thought , was really perfect . But as soon as [he]122-soren thought of the word “ perfect , ”[122-soren] [he]122-soren realized no , not quite . And once more that strange melancholy feeling began to creep like a mist over [him]122-soren . [He]122-soren knew what it was immediately this time . [Eglantine]130-eglantine . What had happened to [[his]122-soren dear baby sister]1156-his dear baby sister ? [He]122-soren supposed that if [she]1156-his dear baby sister were alive , and if [she]1156-his dear baby sister had not been captured by [St. Aggie]124-st. aggie ’s or something worse , [she]1156-his dear baby sister would be flying by now . But who would ever see [her]1156-his dear baby sister ? Not [[his]122-soren parents]268-his parents . Who knew if [they]268-his parents were still alive ? [Soren]122-soren grew very quiet . [Mrs. P.]128-mrs. p. sensed [his]122-soren sadness .

“ Come up later , [[Soren]122-soren dear]1993-soren dear , and sit with [me]128-mrs. p. a spell and tell [me]128-mrs. p. all about [your]122-soren adventures in [the burning forest]1994-the burning forest . ”[128-mrs. p.]

“ Sure , [Mrs. P.]128-mrs. p. , ”[122-soren] [he]122-soren said distractedly .

But [he]122-soren did n’t . [He]122-soren was simply too tired from the flight , the work at the fire , to do anything but go right to sleep . [He]122-soren was so tired [he]122-soren did not even hear the beautiful voice of [Madame Plonk]183-madame plonk . And underneath the voice that morning there was an especially lovely rippling sound , almost liquid , as [Mrs. Plithiver]120-mrs. plithiver slid with a steady pressure very quickly from the midpoint on a string and stretched for the next octave , all the way to G - flat . It was a virtuoso move and [Madame Plonk]183-madame plonk knew that [she]183-madame plonk had made the right decision . [This Mrs. P.]128-mrs. p. had a [maestro]1158-maestro ’s touch to match [her]128-mrs. p. own magnificent voice .

But , of course , [Soren]122-soren slept through it all , dreaming perhaps of [[his]122-soren little sister]1159-his little sister , but perhaps [he]122-soren was even too tired for dreams .

CHAPTER TWENTY - TWO

Owlets Down !

While [Soren]122-soren slept , in [a distant woods]1160-a distant woods across [the Sea of Hoolemere]33-the sea of hoolemere , Twilight swooped through the gathering gloom at the end of the day . [He]122-soren and [Primrose]181-primrose and [Digger]126-digger worked together . [Digger]126-digger , of course , as part of [the tracking chaw]1161-the tracking chaw , did the groundwork , looking for telltale pellets , a fluff of down , or , sometimes , a wounded or dead owlet . [Primrose]181-primrose , who was in [the search - and - rescue chaw]1162-the search - and - rescue chaw along with [Twilight]123-twilight , flew all levels as [an outrider]1163-an outrider and kept a sharp lookout for [enemies]1164-enemies . [Twilight]123-twilight did most of the heavy work of lifting the owlets and when possible restoring them to [[their]1165-their nests]1404-their nests .

This particular mission had started as what [Barran]172-barran described as routine . But it quickly became something much more complicated . In the first reconnaissance wave , a number of owlets had been reported on the ground , but [they]1167-they did not seem to be near [[their]1167-they nests]1404-their nests . At first [the rescuers]1169-the rescuers thought [these owls]1170-these owls , stunned and cold , simply had forgotten where [their]1170-these owls nests were , which trees [they]1170-these owls had fallen from . But then it became apparent that in the nearby trees there were no hollows , no possible nests for [these young owls]1171-these young owls . So where had [they]1170-these owls come from ? Had [they]1170-these owls been snatched by [[St. Aggie]124-st. aggie ’s patrols]265-st. aggie ’s patrols and then , in flight , somehow mutinied and escaped the talons of [[their]1170-these owls captors]1173-their captors , falling to the ground ? But why would [[St. Aggie]124-st. aggie ’s patrols]265-st. aggie ’s patrols not retrieve them ? It was all quite mystifying . The other thing that was peculiar was that [they]1170-these owls were all Barn Owls , not just Tyto alba like [Soren]122-soren , but Masked Owls and [Grass Owls]83-grass owls and Sooty Owls , all belonging to [the Barn Owl family]1175-the barn owl family .

[Twilight]123-twilight divided [his]123-twilight attention between [Digger]126-digger below and [Primrose]181-primrose , who was flying over [him]123-twilight . [He]123-twilight had retracted [his]123-twilight battle claws , because there did not seem to be any St. [Aggie ’s agents]1176-aggie ’s agents around and it was necessary to pull [them]1176-aggie ’s agents in when picking up a fallen owlet , so as not to hurt it . [Another Great Gray]1177-another great gray was wearing [his]1177-another great gray battle claws fully extended and circling in case of ambush . [They]1178-they traded off . This was how [the search - and - rescue chaw]1162-the search - and - rescue chaw operated — in pairs , with [one owl]1180-one owl flying in full battle suit while [the other]1181-the other was prepared to pick up an owlet in distress . When one was found , it was taken to a gathering spot in a large hollow presided over by [one of [Barran]172-barran ’s assistants]1182-one of barran ’s assistants , who could administer medical attention before flying the owls back to [the Great Ga’Hoole Tree]259-the great ga’hoole tree . When there were enough owlets gathered , [they]1178-they set off . But now there were more than enough . That is why backup had been requested . More of everything was needed . [More search - and - rescue workers]1184-more search - and - rescue workers , [more assistants at the gathering spots]1185-more assistants at the gathering spots , [more trackers]1186-more trackers . It was an almost overwhelming situation . Never had [they]1178-they dealt with so many nestless owlets . Where were [[their]1178-they parents]905-their parents ? Where were [[their]1178-they hollows]1188-their hollows ? [They]1178-they seemed to have dropped out of nowhere .

[Twilight]123-twilight spotted a Sooty Owl on the ground . This was the most difficult time of the day for [owls]1480-owls to spot downed owlets . [And Sooties]146-the sooties were the most difficult of all owls to spot . Neither black nor white but indeed a smudgy ash color , they seemed to blend in with the twilight . But [Twilight]123-twilight [himself]123-twilight , with [his]123-twilight peculiar gift for seeing at this time , was well suited for the task . Making sure [his]123-twilight battle claws were locked back , [he]123-twilight began a quick plunge . [He]123-twilight hoped [the little fellow]1190-the little fellow was n’t dead .

Cautiously [he]123-twilight poked it with [his]123-twilight beak . [He]123-twilight detected a heartbeat . Then gently [he]123-twilight scooped it up in [his]123-twilight talons . It stirred a bit and tried to lift its head . [He]123-twilight thanked [Glaux]131-glaux , there was life in this one . There was nothing worse than picking up a dead owlet . Despite [their]1178-they small size , [they]1178-they seemed to be especially heavy , and if [their]1178-they eyes were n’t closed and [they]1178-they were dead , it was awful ! [Barran]172-barran had not expected that [they]1178-they would encounter any dead owlets on [their]1178-they first mission . [She]1191-she was very upset for [the new members of the chaw]1192-the new members of the chaw . “ It was n’t supposed to be like this , ”[1191-she] [she]1191-she kept saying .

“ Now [you]1193-the owlet take it easy , [little Sooty]139-sooty owls , ”[123-twilight] [Twilight]123-twilight spoke gently to [the owlet]1193-the owlet . “ [We]1178-they ’re going to get [you]1193-the owlet nice and fixed up . Do n’t [you]1193-the owlet worry . [You]1193-the owlet ’re in the talons of a champ here ! ”[123-twilight] [Twilight]123-twilight could n’t resist a little exhibition of [his]123-twilight finer flight maneuvers . Besides , [an owlet]1194-an owlet might find them comforting .

Hush little owl ,

[You]1193-the owlet ’re with Twi .

[I]0-i got the moves to get [you]1193-the owlet by .

Big bad crows .

[St. Aggie]124-st. aggie ’s scamps

Ai n’t got nothin to show [this champ]1195-this champ .

[I]0-i ’ll pop a spiral

With a twist ,

Do a three - sixty

And scatter mist —

In the middle of what [Twilight]123-twilight considered one of [his]123-twilight finest poetry compositions that [he]123-twilight had ever made up midair , [the little Sooty]139-sooty owls began to make a sound like a weak whistle .

“ [My]139-sooty owls Tyto , [[my]139-sooty owls Tyto]1995-my tyto , why hast [thou]1996-thou forsaken [us]1997-us in [our]1997-us purity ? ”[139-sooty owls]

[Twilight]123-twilight looked down at the limp little Sooty in [his]123-twilight talons . “ What are [you]123-twilight talking about ? Forsaken ? [You]123-twilight call this forsaken ? Look , [I]123-twilight ’m not Glaux but [you]1196-the little sooty ’re safe right here in [my]123-twilight talons . Safer than [you]1196-the little sooty were down on the ground . ”[123-twilight] But [the little Sooty]1196-the little sooty just stared at [him]123-twilight with vacant dark eyes .

[Strix Struma]187-strix struma was suddenly on [his]123-twilight upwind side . “ Do n’t be upset , [Twilight]123-twilight . [All these owlets]1998-all these owlets are babbling some kind of nonsense . It ’s all very weird . This is not like what [they]1998-all these owlets did at [St. Aggie]124-st. aggie ’s with the moon - blinking business , but it ’s strange . Very strange talk all the time about [Tyto]226-tyto . [Bubo]197-bubo and [Boron]171-boron are on [their]1998-all these owlets way and [Ezylryb]191-ezylryb is coming as well . ”[187-strix struma]

“ Ezylryb ? ”[123-twilight] [Twilight]123-twilight was surprised . [Ezylryb]191-ezylryb never left [the Great Ga’Hoole Tree]50-the great ga’hoole tree , except for forest fires and weather interpretation . A lot of owlets falling out of nowhere did n’t seem to be a weather situation or a forest fire .

“ [We]1197-we need all the help [we]1197-we can get and not just for the rescue . Something ’s going on out here and [we]1197-we must get to the bottom of it . ”[187-strix struma] What [Strix Struma]187-strix struma did not add was that it was for precisely that reason why [they]1197-we needed [Ezylryb]191-ezylryb . Only [Ezylryb]191-ezylryb , with [his]191-ezylryb immense knowledge gleaned from years of reading and [his]191-ezylryb long life of experiences throughout [every owl kingdom]1198-every owl kingdom , might be able to begin to understand what was going on here . [Strix Struma]187-strix struma was as worried as [she]187-strix struma had ever been . Was it a plague of some sort ? A spell ? A bewitchment ? [She]187-strix struma did n’t believe in such nonsense . [She]187-strix struma broke off these thoughts . “ Get that Sooty back to [the gathering spot]1999-the gathering spot and then if [you]2000-you have it in [you]2000-you and feel [you]2000-you could fly one more mission , do so . ”[187-strix struma] [She]187-strix struma sheered off downwind .

“ All this talk about purity and [Tytos]136-tytos . Never heard such a bunch of babble in [my]227-elsie life . ”[227-elsie] It was [Elsie]227-elsie , a rather bunchy - looking Barred Owl , who seemed to have more feathers than [her]227-elsie small body could manage . The bar designs on [her]227-elsie wings had almost faded into a blur . But [she]227-elsie was a kindly old bird , who , along with [Matron]175-matron , was in charge of the care and feeding of all the newly arrived young owlets at [the Great Ga’Hoole Tree]259-the great ga’hoole tree . Never before had the two owls been actually brought out to [a gathering station]1200-a gathering station on a search - and - rescue mission , however .

“ Over here , [Twilight]123-twilight , ”[175-matron] [Matron]175-matron called . “ [I]175-matron have just fluffed up a place . That Sooty will fit in nicely . [Elsie]227-elsie dear , spare [me]175-matron a bit more down for this Sooty . ”[175-matron]

[Elsie]227-elsie obliged by plucking out some downy fluff from beneath [her]227-elsie primaries . [Twilight]123-twilight blinked . It was just as [Elsie]227-elsie said . A low babble came in a steady stream from [the little owlets]1201-the little owlets , and [they]1201-the little owlets were all reciting some kind of poetry , and it made absolutely no sense to [Twilight]123-twilight .

[One little Grass Owl]228-one little grass owl was now chanting in a thin little voice , “ [Tytos]136-tytos now forever , so pure , so rare ! Yet supreme ! ”[228-one little grass owl] [A Masked Owl]1202-a masked owl spoke of [a Tyto to whom righteousness]1203-a tyto to whom righteousness belonged and still another was crying out , “ Oh , [Tyto]226-tyto , who is pureness beyond compare , show thyself … [Tyto]226-tyto , how long shall the impure triumph ? ”[197-bubo]

“ Depressing little ditties , are n’t [they]1201-the little owlets ? ”[197-bubo] [Bubo]197-bubo said as [he]197-bubo lighted down next to [Twilight]123-twilight .

“ What are [they]1201-the little owlets talking about ? ”[123-twilight] [Twilight]123-twilight said .

“ [I]197-bubo do n’t know , but [I]197-bubo ’ve heard more cheerful tunes in [my]197-bubo day than all this whining about [Tytos]136-tytos . ”[197-bubo]

As [Twilight]123-twilight and [Primrose]181-primrose and [Digger]126-digger took off for [their]1204-their last mission , the ragtag ends of mournful songs seemed to trail out behind [them]1204-their . “ [My]181-primrose goodness , ”[181-primrose] sighed [Primrose]181-primrose . “ It ’s enough to make [you]126-digger long for a nice little wet poop joke . ”[1205-her] [She]1205-her dropped down to [her]1205-her mid - level surveillance position , and then [Digger]126-digger flew under [her]1205-her . It was well beyond the last of the daylight . It was night . No longer flying on that silver border , [Twilight]123-twilight would wait for signals from [Primrose]181-primrose or [Digger]126-digger if [they]1204-their found any owlets down . [Digger]126-digger now swooped in close to the ground . In the muddy runoff from [a creek]386-a creek , [he]126-digger saw the distinctive markings of [a Barn Owl]129-kludd ’s front talons , the toes exactly equal lengths . [He]126-digger followed the talon marks down [the muddy path]1207-the muddy path . Perhaps this one was not injured so badly if it could walk , [Digger]126-digger thought . But where could it have walked ? And why ? [He]126-digger saw a buff - colored feather in the path ahead . A feather of an almost fully fledged owl , it would seem . So why not fly ? And just within that moment , under the low branches of a juniper , [he]126-digger saw a tawny glow in the night and [he]126-digger heard the long , drawn - out hiss , the begging call of [a Tyto alba]1208-a tyto alba . “ Coo coo ROOOO ! Coo coo ROOOO ! ”[1208-a tyto alba]

[Digger]126-digger hooted the signal indicating a downed owlet .

As [Digger]126-digger waited for [Twilight]123-twilight to spiral down , the strangest feeling began to steal over [him]126-digger . [Twilight]123-twilight settled down next to [him]126-digger .

“ What have [we]1209-we got here ? ”[123-twilight] [Twilight]123-twilight said .

“ [Another Barn Owl]2001-another barn owl , but not [a Masked]2002-a masked or a Sooty or [a Grass Owl]2003-a grass owl . ”[123-twilight]

“ No , ”[123-twilight] [Twilight]123-twilight said in a whisper . “ A Tyto alba . ”[123-twilight]

“ Like [Soren]122-soren , ”[1209-we] [they]1209-we both said at once . [Digger]126-digger looked at [Twilight]123-twilight . [He]126-digger almost did n’t dare say it . “ Do [you]126-digger think it could be ? ”[126-digger]

“ Remember , ”[123-twilight] [Twilight]123-twilight said , “ how [Soren]122-soren once told [us]1209-we that [[his]122-soren sister]347-his sister had a speckle near [her]347-his sister eye . That it looked as if one of those dots from [her]347-his sister head feathers had just slipped down to [her]347-his sister eye and that it was the same with [[his]122-soren mother]2005-his mother , that [she]2005-his mother , too , had a slipped dot ? ”[123-twilight]

“ Yes , ”[126-digger] said [Digger]126-digger slowly .

“ Look ! ”[123-twilight]

[The two owls]754-the two owls brought [their]754-the two owls beaks close to the little owl , whose cries had grown weaker and weaker and then stopped . [They]754-the two owls almost forgot to breathe in [their]754-the two owls anguish . There was indeed a tiny speckle in the darker feathers on the inside corner of [her]1211-she eye . But if this was [Eglantine]130-eglantine , was [she]1211-she alive ? Was [she]1211-she dead ? Was [she]1211-she truly … ?

“ [Eglantine]130-eglantine ? ”[754-the two owls] [they]754-the two owls both called softly .

CHAPTER TWENTY - THREE

At Last !

[I]0-i need some more worms over here , quick ! ” [the nest - maid snake]2006-the nest - maid snake called out .[0-i]

“ The Ga’Hoolology chaw is digging [them]2007-them as fast as [they]2007-them can , ”[754-the two owls] another snake called . “ Oh , [my]754-the two owls goodness , what a mess [this little Sooty Owl]2008-this little sooty owl is . ”[754-the two owls] The snake nudged the last worm of [her]1211-she supply on the gash in the Sooty ’s wing . “ [Poor little fellow]2009-poor little fellow . Now stop that babbling , [dear]1344-dear . [You]2009-poor little fellow do n’t have enough energy . ”[754-the two owls] But the owlet kept up a steady singsong about a world of Tyto purity and supremacy .

There had never been such a flurry in [the Great Ga’Hoole Tree]50-the great ga’hoole tree . [The infirmary]1212-the infirmary was brimming with stunned and wounded owls . And [no one]880-no one was spared a moment ’s rest . The owls of the tree were cutting back and forth between branches , flying in [the new arrivals]1579-the new arrivals , rushing about getting fresh worms for [their]1579-the new arrivals wounds , plucking down from [their]1579-the new arrivals own breasts to make up new beds , bringing cup after cup of milkberry tea . The nest - maid snakes were at the point of complete exhaustion and even [Madame Plonk]183-madame plonk , who rarely lifted a talon around the tree to do anything , could not bear seeing [her]183-madame plonk harp guild so worn out . So [she]183-madame plonk joined in right beside [them]1579-the new arrivals , learning how to place worms properly on the open wounds . [Soren]122-soren and [Gylfie]125-gylfie worked as hard as [anyone]394-anyone , either fetching things for the nest - maid snakes or cleaning out new hollows , because [the infirmary]1212-the infirmary was too full to accommodate any more . There was barely time to wonder about what had brought this on . But , of course , in the back of [their]1579-the new arrivals minds was the horrible nagging fear that [St. Aggie]124-st. aggie ’s was somehow involved , and if not [St. Aggie]124-st. aggie ’s , perhaps the “ [you]2011-you only wish ”[124-st. aggie] ! Were the poor little owls babbling about the same horror that [the murdered Barred Owl]1217-the murdered barred owl had when [he]1217-the murdered barred owl gasped the words “ [you]2011-you only wish ”[1217-the murdered barred owl] ? But what did it really matter ? [Owlets]121-owlets down were wounded and dying .

For the life of [him]122-soren , [Soren]122-soren could not understand this babble that seemed to pour out of the owlets ’ ceaselessly clacking beaks . It never seemed as if there was an entire phrase . The words came out disjointed and broken , but always there was something about [Tytos]136-tytos , or [Barn Owls]135-barn owls .

Then overhead , [Soren]122-soren heard the arrival of a new batch of owlets being brought in . There was no quiet flying this day . Owls that once prided [themselves]1218-their on silent flight beat [their]1218-their wings furiously , in [their]1218-their desperate efforts to get the injured owlets to safety .

“ [SOREN]122-soren ! ”[122-soren] The sound of [his]122-soren own name split the warm air . [Soren]122-soren looked up from [his]122-soren task of pecking out worms . It was [Twilight]123-twilight who had called down to [him]122-soren and [he]122-soren was flanked by [Primrose]181-primrose and [Digger]126-digger . [The rest of the search - and - rescue chaw]1219-the rest of the search - and - rescue chaw was following .

“ [Soren]122-soren , get up here fast as [you]122-soren can , ”[123-twilight] [Twilight]123-twilight called again .

Then [Digger]126-digger spiraled down . “ This is important . Bring that worm and come on . ”[126-digger]

“ No ! No ! ”[710-another owl] [another owl]710-another owl said tersely . “ All worms must be put into the pile first . [[Our]1221-they chaw ryb]2012-our chaw ryb said so . ”[710-another owl]

“ Drop the worm , [Soren]122-soren , and just come . ”[122-soren] [Soren]122-soren could n’t imagine what could be so important that [they]1221-they needed [him]122-soren so quickly . [He]122-soren followed [Digger]126-digger to [a new hollow [they]1221-they had just fixed up to take care of the overflow from [the infirmary]1212-the infirmary]1222-a new hollow they had just fixed up to take care of the overflow from the infirmary . Outside [the hollow]372-the hollow , [Gylfie]125-gylfie and [Primrose]181-primrose perched on a branch . [They]1221-they were very still . [Soren]122-soren got an awful feeling in [his]122-soren gizzard . [He]122-soren hesitated . [He]122-soren really did not want to go into [that hollow]1225-that hollow . [Digger]126-digger gave [him]122-soren a bit of a nudge . Then [Gylfie]125-gylfie came up on the other side . The shadows from [the hollow]372-the hollow seemed to draw [him]122-soren in against [his]122-soren will . [He]122-soren blinked . [Twilight]123-twilight stood beside a heap of golden feathers splotched with blood .

“ So ? ”[122-soren] [Soren]122-soren said .

[Twilight]123-twilight ’s usually gruff voice became a soft whisper . “ So , [Soren]122-soren , is this [[your]122-soren sister]1689-your sister , [Eglantine]130-eglantine ? ”[123-twilight]

[Soren]122-soren felt [his]122-soren gizzard drop to [his]122-soren talons . [He]122-soren wobbled but [Gylfie]125-gylfie was on one side and [Digger]126-digger on the other . [He]122-soren forced [himself]122-soren to look down at the battered little owlet . But [she]1227-she really was hardly an owlet anymore . [She]1227-she was fully fledged and streaked with blood . A red bubble burbled from [her]1227-she beak as [she]1227-she , too , tried to babble .

“ No ! No ! This ca n’t be ! ”[122-soren] [Soren]122-soren wailed . [He]122-soren felt [his]122-soren legs collapse under [him]122-soren and [he]122-soren crumpled beside [her]1227-she . “ [Eglantine]130-eglantine ! [Eglantine]130-eglantine ! ”[122-soren]

“ Get [Mrs. Plithiver]120-mrs. plithiver , quick ! ”[125-gylfie] [Gylfie]125-gylfie rasped .

Time began to have no meaning for [Soren]122-soren . Was it day ? Was it night ? How many nights had passed since [they]1228-they had brought in [Eglantine]130-eglantine ? At first , [he]122-soren was numb . [He]122-soren could not do anything . [Mrs. Plithiver]120-mrs. plithiver nursed [Eglantine]130-eglantine ceaselessly . “ Will [she]130-eglantine live ? ”[120-mrs. plithiver] That was all [Soren]122-soren could say .

“ [I]128-mrs. p. ’m not sure , [dear]1344-dear , ”[128-mrs. p.] [Mrs. P.]128-mrs. p. said honestly . “ All [we]2015-we can do is try . ”[128-mrs. p.]

Finally , [Soren]122-soren began to help . [He]122-soren tried feeding [her]1227-she a bit of milkberry tea and in a low voice kept saying , “ [Eglantine]130-eglantine , it ’s [me]122-soren , [Soren]122-soren . It ’s [[your]130-eglantine brother]734-your brother [Soren]122-soren . ”[122-soren] But [Eglantine]130-eglantine , with [her]130-eglantine eyes half shut , only continued to babble a word or two of the singsong ditties [they]1229-they all sang . [She]130-eglantine did seem to be getting better , however , stronger . And when [her]130-eglantine eyes opened fully , [Soren]122-soren grew excited . “ [Eglantine]130-eglantine ! ”[122-soren] [He]122-soren leaned over [her]130-eglantine . “ [Eglantine]130-eglantine . It ’s [me]122-soren . [Soren]122-soren ! And [Mrs. P.]128-mrs. p. is here , too ! ”[122-soren] But there was not even a flicker of recognition in [her]130-eglantine eyes . [She]130-eglantine merely clacked [her]130-eglantine beak a couple of times and resumed the babble . [Soren]122-soren sighed .

“ Patience , [dear]1344-dear . Patience , ”[120-mrs. plithiver] said [Mrs. Plithiver]120-mrs. plithiver . “ All things take time . See how much stronger [her]130-eglantine voice is . ”[120-mrs. plithiver]

But [Soren]122-soren did not like what [he]122-soren was hearing . [She]130-eglantine spoke only of [Tytos]136-tytos , ofTytos reigning supreme , seeking vengeance , of [Tyto purity]226-tyto , of [Tyto superiority]226-tyto , of [a world only of [Tytos]136-tytos]1230-a world only of tytos . That these were [[his]122-soren very best friends]1234-his very best friends in all [the world]1373-the world , that [they]1234-his very best friends were [a band]277-a band ?

By the next evening , [Eglantine]130-eglantine was well enough to get up on [her]130-eglantine talons and take a few steps . [Soren]122-soren led [her]130-eglantine carefully out on the branch and stood beside [her]130-eglantine . But [he]122-soren might as well have been standing beside a stump . [She]130-eglantine did whatever [he]122-soren told [her]130-eglantine , but there was still no recognition . [He]122-soren brought [her]130-eglantine into [the hollow]372-the hollow [he]122-soren shared with [Twilight]123-twilight , [Digger]126-digger , and [Gylfie]125-gylfie to sleep , and [Primrose]181-primrose came just before [Madame Plonk]183-madame plonk began [her]183-madame plonk song , to show [Eglantine]130-eglantine some especially pretty berries [she]181-primrose had strung .

“ See , [Eglantine]130-eglantine . Ever since [I]183-madame plonk have been [here]1419-here , [I]183-madame plonk have collected a few berries from each season . [I]183-madame plonk ’ll make [you]130-eglantine one , too . ”[183-madame plonk] But [Eglantine]130-eglantine did not respond .

“ This is worse than being moon blinked , ”[122-soren] [Soren]122-soren whispered to [Gylfie]125-gylfie .

[Gylfie]125-gylfie did n’t know what to say . [She]125-gylfie felt desperately sorry for [Soren]122-soren . [She]125-gylfie knew that [Soren]122-soren had missed [Eglantine]130-eglantine so fiercely . But to have [her]130-eglantine back like this was almost worse than not having [her]130-eglantine back at all . [Gylfie]125-gylfie , of course , would never dare say such a thing to [Soren]122-soren . Just then [Otulissa]176-otulissa peeked [her]176-otulissa head in .

“ May [I]176-otulissa come in ? ”[176-otulissa]

“ Sure , ”[122-soren] [Soren]122-soren said .

“ Look , [I]176-otulissa ’ve been in [the library]599-the library all this time working on Tyto research , to see if there is anything that would explain this — all of [them]2020-them being [Tytos]136-tytos and babbling about [Tytos]136-tytos , but [I]176-otulissa somehow got distracted and started looking at a book by [a distinguished Spotted Owl]2021-a distinguished spotted owl that ’s about owls ’ brains and feelings and gizzards . ”[176-otulissa]

“ [Great Glaux]131-glaux , ”[123-twilight] [Twilight]123-twilight muttered and yarped a pellet out the hollow ’s opening . “ No doubt [a relative of [yours]122-soren]2022-a relative of yours , [Otulissa]176-otulissa . ”[123-twilight]

“ Well , possibly . There were [many distinguished intellects in [our]2024-our ancestry]2023-many distinguished intellects in our ancestry and [we]2024-our do go back so far . “ Well , that explains so much , ”[122-soren] [Soren]122-soren said sarcastically . “ What in [Glaux]131-glaux ’s name am [I]122-soren supposed to do about it ? ”[122-soren]

“ Well … well , ”[176-otulissa] [Otulissa]176-otulissa stammered . “ [I]176-otulissa ’m not sure . [She]1689-your sister just ca n’t help it , ”[176-otulissa] [Otulissa]176-otulissa said feebly . “ [I]122-soren … [I]122-soren mean … [I’m]122-soren sure [she]1689-your sister loves [you]122-soren still . ”[122-soren] [Soren]122-soren stared at [her]176-otulissa with a hard glint . “ Oh , [dear]1344-dear . None of this is coming out right . ”[122-soren] [Otulissa]176-otulissa ’s eyes welled with tears . “ [I]176-otulissa was just trying to be helpful . ”[176-otulissa]

[Soren]122-soren just sighed , turned away , and began to fluff up the bed [they]1238-they had made for [Eglantine]130-eglantine .

That day , as the darkness leaked away into the morning and the light of morning turned harsh in the glare of noon , in that hot slow time of the day when the silence pressed down despite the babble , [Soren]122-soren felt as lonely as [he]122-soren had ever felt in [his]122-soren life . Lonelier than that first frightening night on the ground when [he]122-soren had been pushed out of the nest by [[his]122-soren brother]794-his brother , [Kludd]129-kludd , lonelier than when [he]122-soren had been at [St. Aggie ’s]124-st. aggie , lonelier than when [he]122-soren had almost given up on ever seeing any of [[his]122-soren family]758-his family again . This was the most excruciating loneliness [he]122-soren had ever imagined . [Eglantine]130-eglantine was here at last , but was [she]130-eglantine really ?

[CHAPTER TWENTY - FOUR

Trader Mags

Soren]122-soren had been looking forward , it seemed forever , to the day that [Trader Mags]122-soren would come with [her]130-eglantine wares . But now it meant nothing to [him]122-soren . Still , there was certainly a buzz of excitement as [they]1241-they roused [themselves]1241-they at the end of the day in anticipation of the magpie ’s arrival around twilight . [Everyone]311-everyone was excited except for [Soren]122-soren and , of course , [the nest - maids]1243-the nest - maids , who considered [magpies]1244-magpies among the worst of the wet poopers , almost as bad as seagulls . [He]122-soren supposed [he]122-soren would go and drag [Eglantine]130-eglantine around , although [he]122-soren doubted it would mean anything to [her]130-eglantine . [Mags]122-soren would be showing [her]130-eglantine wares all evening , so there was no rush .

[She]130-eglantine was late and [no one]880-no one was more upset than [Madame Plonk]183-madame plonk . From [[his]122-soren hollow]694-his hollow , [Soren]122-soren could hear [her]130-eglantine several branches above [him]122-soren on a lookout perch , waiting with other owls . “ If that bird was ever on time in [her]130-eglantine life , [I]130-eglantine ’ll eat [my]130-eglantine harp ! ”[130-eglantine] [Madame Plonk]183-madame plonk was fuming . “ [She]130-eglantine has no sense of time . Here it is past twilight , nearly First Black . ”[183-madame plonk] But suddenly , curling out of the night , came a lovely warbling sound .

“ It ’s the carol ! ”[1467-someone] [someone]1467-someone shouted . And a cheer went up . [Mags]122-soren was approaching and [her]130-eglantine caroling threaded through the night . The warble of magpies was known as a carol and was like no other birdsong in [the world]1373-the world . [He]122-soren heard the owls now , swooping down through the branches to the base of the tree where [Mags]122-soren would set up [her]130-eglantine wares . [She]130-eglantine came with [several assistants]1249-several assistants , carrying baskets of [her]130-eglantine latest “ collection , ”[130-eglantine] as [she]130-eglantine called [her]130-eglantine wares .

“ Want to go down , [Eglantine]130-eglantine ? ”[122-soren] [Soren]122-soren said . [Eglantine]130-eglantine , of course , said nothing but got up and followed [Soren]122-soren . [She]130-eglantine had recovered [her]130-eglantine flight skills almost immediately and [the two]1035-the two alighted on the ground together as [Mags]122-soren and [[her]130-eglantine assistants]1251-her assistants spread out the collection .

There was a festive mood with much chattering and special treats that cook had whipped up . [Bubo]197-bubo stomped forward and gave [Mags]122-soren a great hug with [his]197-bubo wings that nearly knocked [her]130-eglantine over . [Mags]122-soren looked nothing like [Soren]122-soren had expected . [Her]130-eglantine feathers were mostly black and the sleekest , blackest black [he]122-soren had ever seen , but [she]130-eglantine did have some streaks of white feathers . [Her]130-eglantine tail was immensely long and , on this moonlit night , [her]130-eglantine black tail feathers had a greenish gloss . [She]130-eglantine wore a jaunty bandanna on [her]130-eglantine head . “ More where these came from , [[my]130-eglantine dears]1532-my dears ! ”[130-eglantine] [she]130-eglantine squawked . [Soren]122-soren could have been knocked over by that squawk . How could [the same throat that produced that lovely carol]1252-the same throat that produced that lovely carol be squawking as raucous as a seagull ?

“ Come on up , do n’t be shy , ”[122-soren] [Mags]122-soren said . “ [Bubbles]229-bubbles , [Bubbles]229-bubbles ! ”[130-eglantine] [she]130-eglantine squawked at [a smaller magpie]1253-a smaller magpie . “ Where ’re them sparklies [I]130-eglantine got at the whatchamacallit for [Madame]183-madame plonk ? “ Away , ”[171-boron] [Boron]171-boron said cryptically .

“ Ha ! ”[197-bubo] [Bubo]197-bubo laughed . “ If that ai n’t a pile of yarped pellets . ”[197-bubo]

[Soren]122-soren felt [Eglantine]130-eglantine flinch . “ [You]122-soren okay , [Eglantine]130-eglantine ? ”[130-eglantine] [She]130-eglantine said nothing but [he]122-soren noticed that [she]130-eglantine had turned toward [Madame Plonk]183-madame plonk , who was admiring [herself]183-madame plonk in a fragment of mirror that [Mags]122-soren had brought .

[They]1255-they had moved on . Walking along , [they]1255-they looked at other simpler cloths that had been spread with a variety of items — a bright pocket watch , several broken saucers with a sign that said “ mendable , ”[122-soren] a strange flower that [Soren]122-soren paused to look at . “ It ai n’t real , ”[1256-the little magpie] [the little magpie]1256-the little magpie , [Bubbles]229-bubbles , said .

“ Well , if it is n’t real , what is it ? ”[122-soren] [Soren]122-soren asked .

“ It ’s an unreal flower , ”[229-bubbles] [Bubbles]229-bubbles answered .

“ But why have an unreal flower ? ”[122-soren]

“ It ai n’t never gon na die . [Ya]122-soren see ? ”[122-soren]

[Soren]122-soren did n’t see but moved along . Despite all the merriment , [he]122-soren noticed that [Boron]171-boron and [Strix Struma]187-strix struma were always huddled together in tense conversation . [They]1255-they seemed , in fact , very apart from the entire festive spirit of the evening .

Soon [Soren]122-soren and [Eglantine]130-eglantine joined [Twilight]123-twilight and [Digger]126-digger and [Primrose]181-primrose . [Primrose]181-primrose had traded one of [her]181-primrose strung milkberry bracelets for a tiny comb . And [Digger]126-digger had traded a very smooth pebble for a shell . “ [They]2036-they say it comes from [a very faraway ocean]2037-a very faraway ocean and that once a tiny animal lived inside it , ”[122-soren] [he]122-soren explained .

The moon was beginning to slip away , and [Mags]122-soren had begun to pack up [her]181-primrose wares . It would be time for good light , but suddenly [Soren]122-soren noticed that [Eglantine]130-eglantine was not by [his]122-soren side . [He]122-soren had a terrible moment ’s panic but then spotted [her]130-eglantine standing rigidly in front of a cloth covered with fragments of glass and pretty stones . [Bubbles]229-bubbles was packing up . “ [She]130-eglantine ai n’t moved an inch , ”[229-bubbles] [Bubbles]229-bubbles said . “ Just staring at this stone here , with the sparkles . Ai n’t really gold , [Mags]122-soren says — just little bits of something [she]130-eglantine calls isinglass , some calls it mica . But makes a right pretty rock . Kind of sparkly in places and , if [you]122-soren hold it up , light can shine through it a bit . It ’s kind of like a dusty mirror . Certainly caught [[your]122-soren sister]1689-your sister ’s fancy . There be something wrong with [her]130-eglantine , [I]130-eglantine s’pose ? ”[130-eglantine] [she]130-eglantine said quietly to [Soren]122-soren . “ Here , [dear]1344-dear , [I]130-eglantine ’ll show [you]1344-dear something real pretty [we]2040-we can do with it . ”[130-eglantine] [She]130-eglantine picked up the stone , which was as thin as a blade . “ See what it does now . ”[130-eglantine] [She]130-eglantine held it up to the moon as it swept down on the dark horizon . When the light of the moon touched the stone it grew luminous . At that very same moment , the harp could be heard as [the guild]1257-the guild began [their]1257-the guild evening practice . [No one else]1906-no one else noticed , of course , but for one fraction of a second the stone blade shimmered in a swirl of flickering light and sound .

[Eglantine]130-eglantine began to shake uncontrollably . “ The Place ! [The Place]1355-the place ! ”[130-eglantine] [Eglantine]130-eglantine screamed .

Something started in a dim way to make sense to [Soren]122-soren . [He]122-soren put a talon on [[his]122-soren sister]347-his sister ’s shoulder and spun [her]347-his sister around to face [him]122-soren . “ [Eglantine]130-eglantine , ”[122-soren] [he]122-soren said softly .

[[His]122-soren sister]347-his sister blinked . “ [Soren]122-soren ? Oh , [Soren]122-soren ! ”[347-his sister] [she]347-his sister cried as [he]122-soren swept [her]347-his sister under [his]122-soren wings .

“ [I]229-bubbles ai n’t done nothing , [Mags]122-soren , [I]229-bubbles swear . Nothing . ”[229-bubbles] [Bubbles]229-bubbles was crying and sputtering in near hysterics . “ [I]229-bubbles just held up this here piece of glass [we]2042-we got from [that castle over in [Am - bala]86-am - bala]2043-that castle over in am - bala and [she]347-his sister done gone yoicks . ”[229-bubbles]

“ Take [me]130-eglantine to the music , [Soren]122-soren . Take [me]130-eglantine to the music . Take [us]2042-we all to the music , ”[130-eglantine] [Eglantine]130-eglantine cried .

[CHAPTER TWENTY - FIVE]1261-chapter twenty - five

In the Folds of [the Night]1262-the night

[Soren]122-soren perched on a slender branch next to [Eglantine]130-eglantine . [He]122-soren draped one wing over [her]130-eglantine shoulders . It seemed like a miracle . [[His]122-soren sister]347-his sister was back — really back . And now [she]130-eglantine said [they]1264-they must listen to the harp music . If [she]130-eglantine had told [him]122-soren to hang upside down and be mobbed by crows , [he]122-soren would have . [He]122-soren had never been happier in [his]122-soren life . [The other owlets that had been rescued]1265-the other owlets that had been rescued were now gathering on the limbs outside [the concert hollow]1266-the concert hollow . [Madame Plonk]183-madame plonk rarely allowed [owls]1480-owls to observe harp practice but [she]183-madame plonk made an exception now . [Boron]171-boron came and perched on [the other side of [Eglantine]130-eglantine]1268-the other side of eglantine . [They]1264-they all watched as [the nest - maid snakes of [the guild]1257-the guild]1269-the nest - maid snakes of the guild gathered at the harp and took [their]1269-the nest - maid snakes of the guild positions . [Half of the guild snakes]1271-half of the guild snakes played the higher strings and the other half played the lower strings , and then there were a very few , the most talented harp snakes , that were called sliptweens . The job of [the sliptweens]1272-the sliptweens was to jump octaves . An octave contained all eight tones of the scale . This harp had six and a half octaves , from C - flat below middle C to the G - flat . G - flat was three and a half octaves above middle C. To find a snake that could do that jump and do it well in a split second , causing the most beautiful liquid sound to pour from the harp , was rare . And it could be exhausting work , depending on the composition .

[Mrs. P.]128-mrs. p. was a natural sliptween . And [Soren]122-soren now blinked as [he]122-soren saw a pink streak pass through the strings of the harp and a beautiful sound drifted into the air . It was [Mrs. P.]128-mrs. p. Then , in a flash , [she]128-mrs. p. was back in [her]128-mrs. p. original position , weaving bass notes . It was lovely to watch . Not only was the music magnificent but the snakes [themselves]1269-the nest - maid snakes of the guild , in [their]1269-the nest - maid snakes of the guild varying hues of rosy pinks , wove a continually shifting pattern as [they]1269-the nest - maid snakes of the guild shuttled through the strings of the harp .

[They]1269-the nest - maid snakes of the guild were now playing an old forest cantata . And [Madame Plonk]183-madame plonk ’s voice blended perfectly with the sounds of the harp .

[Soren]122-soren looked at [Eglantine]130-eglantine . [She]130-eglantine had a relaxed , dreamy look in [her]130-eglantine eyes . All of the rescued owlets seemed different now . There was not one clack of a babbling beak . The owls were silent and happy .

[Boron]171-boron had been watching [them]1273-they all from a higher perch . [He]122-soren was deeply perplexed . Happy , of course , that all the owls [they]1273-they had rescued had stopped [their]1273-they babbling . But mystified as to how it had happened . [Beyond Hoole]53-hoole , [he]122-soren sensed that there was a danger lurking that was worse than the owls of [St. Aggie]124-st. aggie ’s . And why had [Ezylryb]191-ezylryb not returned yet ? [Barran]172-barran had come back during the harp practice , but [she]172-barran was surprised that [Ezylryb]191-ezylryb was not yet back . [She]172-barran thought [he]122-soren had a head start on [her]172-barran . “ Do n’t worry , [dear]1344-dear . [He]191-ezylryb ’ll show up . ”[122-soren]

[Soren]122-soren looked at [Boron]171-boron and [Barran]172-barran . Despite [their]1273-they words , [they]1273-they did seem worried . And [Soren]122-soren [himself]122-soren had a funny feeling in [his]122-soren gizzard . [Gylfie]125-gylfie suddenly turned to [him]122-soren .

“ [I]125-gylfie think [they]1273-they ’re worried about [Ezylryb]191-ezylryb . ”[125-gylfie]

[Soren]122-soren blinked . “ Maybe tomorrow [we]1273-they should go out and take a look . ”[122-soren]

[Twilight]123-twilight and [Digger]126-digger alighted at that moment next to [them]1273-they on the branch .

“ Take a look ? ”[126-digger] [Digger]126-digger asked . “ A look for what ? ”[126-digger]

“ [Ezylryb]191-ezylryb , ”[123-twilight] [Twilight]123-twilight said . “ [I]123-twilight heard [them]1273-they talking , too . ”[123-twilight]

There was a sudden pulsing of light in the sky and then a gasp from all the owls as a radiance swept the black night .

“ What is it ? What is it ? ”[126-digger]

“ Oh , great Glaux , [we]1273-they are blessed ! ”[172-barran] hooted [Barran]172-barran .

“ It is the Aurora Glaucora , ”[171-boron] [Boron]171-boron sang out .

[Soren]122-soren , [Gylfie]125-gylfie , [Digger]126-digger , [Twilight]123-twilight , and [Eglantine]130-eglantine all looked at [one another]456-one another . [They]1273-they had no idea what [Barran]172-barran and [Boron]171-boron were talking about . But the sky seemed rinsed with colors , colors that streamed like banners through the night . Suddenly , [Madame Plonk]183-madame plonk abandoned [her]183-madame plonk perch by the harp and flew out into the brilliance of the night . Still singing , [she]183-madame plonk swept through the long lances of light , [her]183-madame plonk white body reflecting the colors . It was irresistible . [Soren]122-soren remembered that morning months ago when [he]122-soren and [Madame Plonk]183-madame plonk had flown through the rainbow . But the rainbow was pale next to these pulsing banners of light that draped the sky . [His]122-soren worries about [Ezylryb]191-ezylryb grew dimmer as the colors grew brighter . The sky beckoned , the shimmering light drew [them]1275-them . But there was a strangeness to it all . [He]122-soren felt a shudder deep in [his]122-soren gizzard . Behind those banners of throbbing light [he]122-soren knew there was blackness . [Ezylryb]191-ezylryb was still missing , [St. Aggie]124-st. aggie ’s was still a threat , and now there was the almost unthinkable , the nearly unspeakable “ [you]122-soren only wish . ”[130-eglantine] Yes , [Eglantine]130-eglantine was back , but was [she]130-eglantine really back ? Was it the same dear [Eglantine]130-eglantine ? [Soren]122-soren felt as if [he]122-soren could no longer trust . For [the world]1373-the world on this night had suddenly become too strange . It was as if everything had been turned inside out and the thing that owls called [heaven]1277-heaven , glaumora , had come down to [Earth]88-earth and swallowed the night . But this was not quite right , [Soren]122-soren thought . Just at that moment [Eglantine]130-eglantine swept in beside [[her]130-eglantine brother]1278-her brother .

“ Is n’t it beautiful , [Soren]122-soren ? Is n’t it just beautiful ? ”[130-eglantine]

“ Just beautiful , ”[122-soren] [Soren]122-soren said absently .

But even as [he]122-soren spoke , [he]122-soren felt a strange dread in [his]122-soren gizzard . Well , [he]122-soren finally thought , [Eglantine]130-eglantine and [I]0-i are together at last , and [we]1279-we need no colors , for just flying with [her]130-eglantine at [my]0-i side is as good as glaumora on [Earth]370-earth . Tomorrow , yes tomorrow , [I]0-i shall search for [Ezylryb]191-ezylryb . [Soren]122-soren recalled the amber squint of [the old Whiskered Screech]188-the whiskered screech ’s injured eye that indeed sparkled with the glint of deepest knowledge . But tonight … [Soren]122-soren and [Eglantine]130-eglantine tipped [their]1279-we white faces to the tinted sky and flew off into the painted night just as the GoldenTalons began to rise .

And yet the talons were no longer golden , just as the sky was no longer black .
